rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall aligned with Vastu for positive energy flow, featuring a welcoming pathway and subtle natural lighting.
Spacious living area oriented to the south-east for enhanced sunlight, integrating eco-friendly design with large windows and energy-efficient insulation.
Dining space adjacent to the kitchen with north-west orientation, ensuring natural light and ventilation for a healthy environment.
Modern eco-friendly kitchen designed for sustainability; uses energy-efficient appliances and recycled materials. North-west oriented to harness morning light.
Master bedroom with south-east orientation, featuring eco-friendly insulation and large windows for natural light.
Bedroom oriented to the east-west axis promoting balanced energy flow, designed with sustainable materials.
Additional bedroom using eco-friendly insulation and natural ventilation techniques, oriented towards south for adequate sunlight.
Bedroom located in the north-west quadrant, ensuring proper energy flow and privacy with sustainable design practices.
Small bedroom designed for guest use, oriented to east-west axis with natural light and ventilation considerations.
Additional bedroom in the north-east corner promoting balanced air flow, using eco-friendly construction materials.
Eco-friendly home theater with soundproofing and energy-efficient lighting. Ideally placed in the west to minimize glare from setting sun while providing a serene viewing experience.
Bathroom located adjacent to master bedroom, designed for natural ventilation and energy efficiency.
Guest bathroom with eco-friendly fixtures and proper ventilation, ensuring a sustainable design approach.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door aligned with Vastu principles for balanced energy flow, featuring eco-friendly materials and design.
Large windows in the living room to allow maximum natural light and ventilation, designed with double glazing for insulation.
South-east facing window in the kitchen for optimal morning sunlight, energy-efficient design, promoting a bright workspace.
